╭──────────────────────────────────────────── 🚀 API CLI Quick Start Guide ────────────────────────────────────────────╮
│                                                                                                                      │
│                                                                                                                      │
│  🚀 AI Chatbot Platform API CLI - Quick Start                                                                        │
│                                                                                                                      │
│  1. Authentication:                                                                                                  │
│     • Login: python api_manage.py login                                                                              │
│     • Check status: python api_manage.py auth-status                                                                 │
│     • Logout: python api_manage.py logout                                                                            │
│                                                                                                                      │
│  2. First Time Setup:                                                                                                │
│     • Check system health: python api_manage.py health                                                               │
│     • Initialize database: python api_manage.py database init                                                        │
│     • Create admin user: python api_manage.py users create admin admin@company.com --superuser                       │
│                                                                                                                      │
│  3. User Management:                                                                                                 │
│     • List users: python api_manage.py users list                                                                    │
│     • Create user: python api_manage.py users create john john@example.com                                           │
│     • Show user details: python api_manage.py users show john                                                        │
│     • Reset password: python api_manage.py users reset-password john                                                 │
│                                                                                                                      │
│  4. Document Management:                                                                                             │
│     • Upload document: python api_manage.py documents upload /path/to/file.pdf                                       │
│     • List documents: python api_manage.py documents list --status completed                                         │
│     • Search documents: python api_manage.py documents search "machine learning"                                     │
│     • Clean up old files: python api_manage.py documents cleanup --older-than 30                                     │
│                                                                                                                      │
│  5. Conversation Management:                                                                                         │
│     • List conversations: python api_manage.py conversations list --user john                                        │
│     • Export conversation: python api_manage.py conversations export 456 --format json                               │
│     • Import conversation: python api_manage.py conversations import backup.json                                     │
│     • Search conversations: python api_manage.py conversations search "API documentation"                            │
│                                                                                                                      │
│  6. Analytics & Monitoring:                                                                                          │
│     • System overview: python api_manage.py analytics overview                                                       │
│     • Usage statistics: python api_manage.py analytics usage --period 7d                                             │
│     • Performance metrics: python api_manage.py analytics performance                                                │
│     • Export report: python api_manage.py analytics export-report                                                    │
│                                                                                                                      │
│  7. Database Management:                                                                                             │
│     • Check status: python api_manage.py database status                                                             │
│     • Run migrations: python api_manage.py database upgrade                                                          │
│     • Create backup: python api_manage.py database backup                                                            │
│     • List tables: python api_manage.py database tables                                                              │
│                                                                                                                      │
│  8. Background Tasks:                                                                                                │
│     • Check status: python api_manage.py tasks status                                                                │
│     • View workers: python api_manage.py tasks workers                                                               │
│     • Monitor queues: python api_manage.py tasks queue                                                               │
│     • Retry failed: python api_manage.py tasks retry-failed                                                          │
│                                                                                                                      │
│  9. Prompt & Profile Management:                                                                                     │
│     • List prompts: python api_manage.py prompts list                                                                │
│     • Add prompt: python api_manage.py prompts add myprompt --content "You are..."                                   │
│     • List profiles: python api_manage.py profiles list                                                              │
│     • Create profile: python api_manage.py profiles add creative --temperature 1.0                                   │
│                                                                                                                      │
│  💡 Pro Tips:                                                                                                        │
│     • All commands work through the API - server must be running                                                     │
│     • Use --help with any command for detailed options                                                               │
│     • Login once and your token will be saved for subsequent commands                                                │
│     • Check python api_manage.py auth-status if you get authentication errors                                        │
│                                                                                                                      │
│  📚 Need more help?                                                                                                  │
│     • Run python api_manage.py --help for all available commands                                                     │
│     • Use python api_manage.py  --help for module-specific commands                                                  │
│     • Each command has detailed help with --help                                                                     │
│                                                                                                                      │
│                                                                                                                      │
